Text:
Download went fine, Wont let me run it though, keeps asking me to insert a disk?

Theres no ISO file or anything though :(

Help
Same here, keeps asking me to insert a disk???
Has anyone figured this one out as yet?
I think you need to put this download on disk, then load it from there. That way it won't ask for the disk
I tried to put it on a disc and use it that way, it does not work. So now I am turning the files into a .img file and Im going to burn that to a disc. I'll tell you if it works!

Ok,this might work. Get Power ISO,and install it so that when u look in my computer,it is displayed there. Then what you do is "mount image" of reason,to the virtual drive. I can't explain this step by step cos its 3AM GMT,and I have had a version of reason on mine for a while. Select number of drives as 1. What will happen if u get it right is reason wont ask for the disk and will begin installation,which takes ages,so don't panic. I hope this helps,most of the copies will be ISO mount.
